item.title: Learning Curves and Multilevel Models
item.description: The purpose of this project is to build an adaptive learning algorithm that uses learner-specific responses to generate predictions and next-item-recommendations on a next item conditioned on the learner’s ability.

item.title: NYU's COVID-19 Response
item.description: As one of many of NYU Langone’s data scientists, I got to collaborate with the wonderful team from the Predictive Analytics Unit from NYU’s Medical Center to develop a model capable of predicting which patients will have favorable outcomes after being hospitalized. These were intense weeks not only at NYU and I am proud of being able to contribute to this project and help our physicians during these challenging times.
